At that moment, she heard a rustling in the
treetops. Hoping it was just the wind, she
looked to the sound and froze—for a large
man with great horns was staring back at her.

＂It's him!＂ she thought. ＂It's Gozu Tenno!＂
She ran away as fast as her feet could carry
her, pushing through thick vegetation and
losing herself further in the mountain depths.

Suddenly, the girl lost her footing and went
tumbling down a steep slope. And though she
avoided serious injury, she sprained her ankle.

The sound of lumbering footsteps came closer.
Closer. CLOSER! As the grim visage of Gozu
Tenno appeared, the girl shut her eyes and
awaited her grisly end. But then, a single hand
reached out and gently touched her leg.

Gozu Tenno picked up the bewildered girl,
took her back to his dwelling, and healed
her various wounds. And when this was done,
he treated her to a delicious meal.

Though the dragon was rumored to be a man-
eater, he was, in fact, a kind-hearted wyrm
who could never look the other way when a
soul was in trouble.

<ruby><rb>噂</rb><rt>うわさ</rt></ruby>の<ruby><rb>人食</rb><rt>ひとく</rt></ruby>いドラゴン、ゴズテンノウの
<ruby><rb>本当</rb><rt>ほんとう</rt></ruby>の<ruby><rb>姿</rb><rt>すがた</rt></ruby>は――<ruby><rb>困</rb><rt>こま</rt></ruby>った<ruby><rb>人間</rb><rt>にんげん</rt></ruby>を

无法丢下有难之人不管的、
心地善良的龙！

他其實──
是隻無法忽視有困擾的人類，

context.en_us:
Gozu Tenno knew of the rumors about him,
which is why he chose a life of solitude in the
mountains. But in truth, he yearned for a day
when people would understand his true nature
and he could finally live among them.

<ruby><rb>山</rb><rt>やま</rt></ruby>に<ruby><rb>籠</rb><rt>こも</rt></ruby>って<ruby><rb>暮</rb><rt>く</rt></ruby>らしていたらしい。

为了不吓到他们才隐居深山。

So as thanks for his aid, the girl thought up
a way to dispel the misunderstanding.
She suggested that, at the next new year,
he should seek to become one of the
Great Twelve chosen by Amaterasu.

<ruby><rb>少女</rb><rt>しょうじょ</rt></ruby>は<ruby><rb>助</rb><rt>たす</rt></ruby>けてくれた<ruby><rb>恩返</rb><rt>おんがえ</rt></ruby>しにと、

大家對牛頭天王的誤會……

context.en_us:
The Great Twelve of Hinomoto are wyrms that
protect the people—and wyrms deeply trusted.
Being chosen for such an honor would ensure
that people would finally see Gozu Tenno for
the kind-hearted dragon he really was.

<ruby><rb>十二竜</rb><rt>じゅうにりゅう</rt></ruby>は<ruby><rb>人間</rb><rt>にんげん</rt></ruby>を<ruby><rb>守</rb><rt>まも</rt></ruby>る、<ruby><rb>頼</rb><rt>たの</rt></ruby>もしい<ruby><rb>存在</rb><rt>そんざい</rt></ruby>。

context.zh_cn:
十二龙乃守护人类的可靠存在。
要是能被选上，
众人也会理解
牛头天王是一头好龙……
context.zh_tw:
十二龍是守護人類的可靠存在。
只要能被選上，
大家就會發現牛頭天王
其實是很善良的龍族。

context.en_us: Gozu Tenno declared loudly that it was a\nbrilliant idea, and immediately set out to earn\na place among the Great Twelve.
context.ja_jp: <ruby><rb>少女</rb><rt>しょうじょ</rt></ruby>の<ruby><rb>提案</rb><rt>ていあん</rt></ruby>に、ゴズテンノウは\n「それは<ruby><rb>名案</rb><rt>めいあん</rt></ruby>です！」と<ruby><rb>膝</rb><rt>ひざ</rt></ruby>を<ruby><rb>打</rb><rt>う</rt></ruby>ち、\n<ruby><rb>十二竜</rb><rt>じゅうにりゅう</rt></ruby>を<ruby><rb>目指</rb><rt>めざ</rt></ruby>すことを<ruby><rb>決</rb><rt>き</rt></ruby>めるのだった。
context.zh_cn:
听闻少女的提议，
牛头天王当即拍案
“真是个好主意！”
遂决定去竞选十二龙。
context.zh_tw:
聽了少女的提議，
牛頭天王拍了下膝蓋表示：
「真是個好主意！」
並決定將成為十二龍作為目標努力。

context.en_us:
But only the first twelve dragons who greeted
Amaterasu would be chosen for the honor—
and since Gozu Tenno walked incredibly slowly,
he departed with plenty of time to spare so he
might arrive and secure his place in line.
context.ja_jp:
<ruby><rb>元旦</rb><rt>がんたん</rt></ruby>、アマテラスへ<ruby><rb>先</rb><rt>さき</rt></ruby>に<ruby><rb>挨拶</rb><rt>あいさつ</rt></ruby>をした
<ruby><rb>十二体</rb><rt>じゅうにたい</rt></ruby>のドラゴンが、<ruby><rb>栄</rb><rt>は</rt></ruby>えある
<ruby><rb>十二竜</rb><rt>じゅうにりゅう</rt></ruby>に<ruby><rb>選</rb><rt>えら</rt></ruby>ばれる。<ruby><rb>歩</rb><rt>あゆ</rt></ruby>みが<ruby><rb>遅</rb><rt>おそ</rt></ruby>い
ゴズテンノウは<ruby><rb>挨拶</rb><rt>あいさつ</rt></ruby>に<ruby><rb>間</rb><rt>ま</rt></ruby>に<ruby><rb>合</rb><rt>あ</rt></ruby>うよう、
<ruby><rb>余裕</rb><rt>よゆう</rt></ruby>を<ruby><rb>持</rb><rt>も</rt></ruby>って<ruby><rb>早</rb><rt>はや</rt></ruby>めに<ruby><rb>出発</rb><rt>しゅっぱつ</rt></ruby>していった。
context.zh_cn:
元旦当天最先拜会天照的
十二头龙将有幸被选为十二龙。
脚步迟缓的牛头天王
为了能及时赶上拜会，
便早早地提前出发。
context.zh_tw:
元旦當天，最早前去
問候天照的十二隻龍族，
將被選為榮譽的十二龍。
走路不快的牛頭天王為確保
有充裕的時間趕路，而提早出發了。

context.en_us:
But after the girl saw Gozu Tenno off, she went
back to her home and beheld a terrible sight:
A great horde of fiends was attacking, and the
entire village was in danger of ruin!
context.ja_jp:
<ruby><rb>少女</rb><rt>しょうじょ</rt></ruby>は<ruby><rb>山</rb><rt>やま</rt></ruby>でゴズテンノウを
<ruby><rb>見送</rb><rt>みおく</rt></ruby>った<ruby><rb>後</rb><rt>あと</rt></ruby>、<ruby><rb>村</rb><rt>むら</rt></ruby>へ<ruby><rb>戻</rb><rt>もど</rt></ruby>ると……そこには
<ruby><rb>信</rb><rt>しん</rt></ruby>じられない<ruby><rb>光景</rb><rt>こうけい</rt></ruby>が<ruby><rb>広</rb><rt>ひろ</rt></ruby>がっていた。
<ruby><rb>突如</rb><rt>とつじょ</rt></ruby>として<ruby><rb>魔獣</rb><rt>まじゅう</rt></ruby>の<ruby><rb>大群</rb><rt>たいぐん</rt></ruby>が<ruby><rb>襲来</rb><rt>しゅうらい</rt></ruby>し、
<ruby><rb>村</rb><rt>むら</rt></ruby>は<ruby><rb>存亡</rb><rt>そんぼう</rt></ruby>の<ruby><rb>危機</rb><rt>きき</rt></ruby>に<ruby><rb>瀕</rb><rt>ひん</rt></ruby>していたのだ！
context.zh_cn:
少女目送他离开后
回到了村里……映入眼帘的
却是令人难以置信的光景。
大群魔兽突然袭来，
村子面临着生死存亡的危机！
context.zh_tw:
少女在山上為牛頭天王送行後，
回到了村子……
眼前的光景卻令她難以置信。
大量魔獸突然襲來，
村子面臨存亡的危機！
